roleset.name: To make a sound like an engine lacking lubrication

roles.note: No evidence found that an agent can occur with this verb: e.g. "she crumped the engine." Arg0 must be added if this usage is found.

roleset.note: Roleset based on parallel additions to VN, PB and sense groupings. No appropriate VN entry found. Framed by Claire

example.name: Typical usage
example.text: The Auto Trans Vehicle's engine crumped while going down-hill.

example.name: Same structure
example.text: Kimi's engine crumped in practice yesterday incurring a ten grid position penalty.
example.arg: incurring a ten grid position penalty
